name: Minotaur Madness
description:
- Simple WASD movements to move

- Right click to make a vertical wall to block off enemies. 

- Left click to make a horizontal wall to block off enemies. 

* Simple game that I made with a group of students back in 2018. I just now found the project going through my files and I just wanted to upload it here for memories  of the things I learned I guess.  *

Note: Yes there are a lot of bugs or things that are broken in the game or is not supposed to happen. You know how it is with class projects haha. 

The object is to move throughout the procedural generated maze to find the goal, which is a cube. Your health goes down as time goes down. You will also take some damage from enemies. You have 5 lives total. You will lose if time or all of your lives and health is 0.
